name: European Respiratory Society
goal:
ERS

ERS is the leading professional,medical organisation in its field in Europe. It is broad-based, with members in over 140 countries. Its scope covers both basic science and clinical medicine.

ERS mission

ERS seeks to alleviate suffering from respiratory disease and promote lung health through research, sharing of knowledge and through medical and public education.
interests: Climate Action, Education, Environment, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Internal Market, Environment, Health and Research legislation such as the framework research programmes
